title: Context File Metadata
description: Schema for YAML frontmatter in Forge context files. Enables structured discovery and selective loading of context without reading file content.

domain.description: Context domain this file belongs to

title.description: Human-readable title of the context file

type.description: How this file is used in the loading protocol

estimatedTokens.description: Approximate token count for full file content (excluding frontmatter)

loadingStrategy.description: When this file should be loaded during context loading

version.description: Semantic version of the context file content

lastUpdated.description: ISO date of last content update

maintainedFor.description: Primary skill or command this context file supports

sections.description: Named sections within the file for selective loading

crossDomainTriggers.description: Other context files to load when this file is loaded (format: domain/filename)

detectionTriggers.description: Code patterns that indicate this file should be loaded

indexedFiles.description: For index-type files: catalog of files in this domain
